active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the prioritization of legally binding regulations (e.g., PCI-DSS, HIPAA) versus voluntary standards (e.g., OWASP MASVS, NIST CSF) when implementing compliance checking for mobile apps. Provide evidence from real-world breaches and propose a hybrid prioritization framework.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

Incorporate these pedagogical elements: - Learning Objectives: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] - Active Learning: Embed prompts in explanations where relevant (e.g., 'Discuss in groups: ...'). - Scaffolding: Distribute flashcards across 4 layers: [INSERT FULL SCAFFOLDING FROM ABOVE]. Generate flashcards using this EXACT schema: Output a JSON array of 25 flashcards, each as an object with fields: {front, correct_answer, distractor1 (with why wrong), distractor2 (with why wrong), distractor3 (with why wrong), explanation, bloom_level, scaffolding_layer}.
